text:
Overheard bus stop conversation (not in China).
"Anyone in any way involved in letting Somalis into the country should be executed for treason."
Solemn nodding. "That's the moderate option."
Only been outside the Orient for a few days, so uncertain how typical this is.
'Cultural Marxist' intellectuals said nice white people wouldn't ever adopt full-communism, and the wholly-captured NGO-USG bureaucracy immigration complex said "Okay, we're on it ..."
I knew Indians were having PR problems, but I'd never have guessed things were this bad.
